subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Optical (flame) Microphone and FM Sweep
author: RetroCom
full_text:
I tried this idea (direct flame modulation) over a year ago. The trouble is, to maintain a microphonic flame the flame is rather small in size. When I introduce probes or wires to the flame is disrupts the microphone effect. Also direct modulation of the flame with an AC signal does not seem to reproduce on the phototransistor receiver. This doesn't mean it can't be done, just that I never came across the right combo to make it work.
Good thinking,

Dave
